venueSupport.description: National contact number for MOJ Courts and Venues
venueSupport.title: Venue Support

judiciary.title: Judiciary
judiciary.description: Can be an array of objects as such will be a collective and use plurals for object arrays (clerks and scribes etc included)

johNameSurname.description: First and Surname of the JOH
johNameSurname.title: JOH Name

johKnownAs.description: Name and salutations, titles to be presented on publications
johKnownAs.title: JOH Known As

isPresiding.description: A flag to indicate whether a judiciary is presiding
isPresiding.title: Is Presiding

documentName.description: Defined for the title of a publications
documentName.title: Document Name

publicationDate.title: Publication date
publicationDate.description: The date + time the list was published

venueType.description: Defines the courts or building being associated to a publication
venueType.title: Venue Type

venueId.title: Venue ID
venueId.description: OU or EPIMS id of the venue used for reference data lookup (future need)

courtListName.title: Sub-list Name
courtListName.description: The name of the court list

courtHouse.title: Court House
courtHouse.description: The court house that owns the court rooms

courtHouseCode.description: Links to the court that is responsible for the courtrooms
courtHouseCode.title: Court House Code

courtHouseContact.description: The contact for the court house
courtHouseContact.title: Court House Contact

courtHouseAddress.description: The address for the court house
courtHouseAddress.title: Court House Address

items.title: Court Room
items.description: The court room that owns the court rooms

courtRoomId.description: Ref data id (EPIMS or OU Court id)
courtRoomId.title: Court Room ID

items.title: Session
items.description: Session associated with the court in the publication

sessionType.description: Type of session (cases that can be heard in the session are associated to a sessiontype)
sessionType.title: Session Type

items.description: Requested to ensure we host the type of hearing channel in the session
items.title: Session Channel

sessionSequenceNumber.description: Sessions order (if more than one then they will be a sequence)
sessionSequenceNumber.title: Sessions order

items.description: Hearing details of the case and associated details for the sitting
items.title: Hearing

hearingId.description: Id of the hearing associated with the scheduling system
hearingId.title: Hearing ID

listNote.description: Will always be required but can be null
listNote.title: List Note

hearingSequence.description: Order of which hearing is to be heard
hearingSequence.title: Hearing Sequence

caseName.title: Case Name
caseName.description: Case name is not always present but should be where available displayed

reportingRestriction.title: Reporting Restriction
reportingRestriction.description: Whether any reporting restrictions are attached to the case

reportingRestrictionDetail.title: Reporting Restrictions Detail
reportingRestrictionDetail.description: The detail / wording of any reporting restrictions attached to the case

examples: This is a reporting restrictions detail

caseNumber.title: Case Number
caseNumber.description: Some systems hold two instances, i.e. it is duplicated across systems (xhibit, cp.. and a second ref number is required

youthCourt.title: Youth Court
youthCourt.description: If the case is to be held or is held in a youth court

committingCourt.title: Committing Court
committingCourt.description: Court the case is registered at. owning court

courtHouseName.title: Court House Name
courtHouseName.description: Court House name of committing/owning court

courtHouseContact.title: Court House Contact
courtHouseContact.description: Contact and name for commiting/owning court

priority.title: Case Priority
priority.description: The priority for the case. Current values in S&L are normal, high, critical and pending

result.title: Result
result.description: Sjo media requirement for the cases that result in a financial penalty, uplift or charges

caseType.title: Case Type
caseType.description: This will be type of the case.

orderDate.title: Order Date
orderDate.description: This will be order date of the case.

caseId.title: Case Linked Id
caseId.description: If a case is linked to another case, Id of that case will appear here.

name.title: Case Name
name.description: Case name is not always present but should be where available displayed

caseSuppressionName.title: Case Suppression Name
caseSuppressionName.description: COP will be using both this and Case Name for their lists

hearingNumber.title: Hearing number
hearingNumber.description: This is also known as informant number

party.title: Party
party.description: Parties involved in the case (defence, prosecution)

partyRole.description: Role of the party, selectable list of roles, i.e. prosecution, solicitor defence etc
partyRole.title: Party Role

friendlyRoleName.description: The descriptive version of the role. E.g a party role of APPLICANT_REPRESENTATIVE, might  have a more descriptive role name (e.g Legal Advisor) that you would want to display
friendlyRoleName.title: Friendly Role Name

attendanceMethod.description: The method of attendance for the party
attendanceMethod.title: Attendance Method

attendanceTime.description: The attendance time for the party
attendanceTime.title: Attendance time

isMasked.description: If the name needs to be masked or hidden from view
isMasked.title: Is Masked

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth for user (not mandated for all parties)
dateOfBirth.title: Date Of Birth

age.description: Date of birth for user (not mandated for all parties)
age.title: Age

inCustody.description: If party is in custody or not
inCustody.title: In Custody

nationality.description: Nationality of party not always required for all parties
nationality.title: Nationality

plea.description: If a plea has been received
plea.title: Plea

offence.title: offence
offence.description: The offence and details of offences associated with the case. It is also known as charges.

offenceWording.title: Offence wording
examples: driving whilst under the influence of alcohol

reportingRestriction.title: Reporting Restriction
reportingRestriction.description: Whether there are any reporting restrictions posed to the offence

reportingRestrictionDetail.title: Reporting Restrictions Detail
reportingRestrictionDetail.description: The detail / wording of any reporting restrictions attached to the offence

examples: This is a reporting restrictions detail

lcsu.title: LCSU
lcsu.description: If any updates on the case as it is heard

judiciary.title: Judiciary
judiciary.description: If a separate or associated joh is required to be in attendance for sitting against a single case

items.description: Channel if different from in court
items.title: Sitting Channel
